attributes.action: scrap taxes for members of the armed forces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it is wrong that the workers of the army, navy and royal air force both regularly and part time pay up to 20% tac on their earnings when they deserve the money for the hard work that they do in the suggestively correct wars we have got involved with

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/taxfree-military/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
